Context: The LLC Laptop Loan Policy has been updated on December 18, 2023. Hotspots can be borrowed for a maximum period of 7 days with two renewal options (subject to availability). The college offers both iPhones and Mifis as hotspots that function as mobile wifi devices. Students are required to return all technology equipment to the LLC location they borrowed it from. For more information, students can sign up for college news and updates on the website or contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca using the phone number 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559. The information provided in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
